newsitem.title: USA: ServiceMaster Barefoot price set. [CORRECTED 14:50 GMT]
newsitem.headline: ServiceMaster Barefoot price set. [CORRECTED 14:50 GMT]

text.p: ServiceMaster LP and Barefoot Inc said Friday that the average ServiceMaster share price for a pending tender offer for Barefoot stock is $25.40833 (corrects from $25.40633).

ServiceMaster had launched a tender offer for Barefoot shares at $16 each. As previously announced, ServiceMaster would pay Barefoot holders in either cash or an equivalent amount of ServiceMaster shares at the election of the Barefoot stockholder.
For Barefoot stockholders who elect to receive ServiceMaster shares in exchange for their Barefoot stock, the conversion ratio will be 0.62971 ServiceMaster share for each Barefoot share tendered.
The average ServiceMaster share price was determined by the 15-day average New York Stock Exchange composite closing price of ServiceMaster shares for the period ending February 13, 1997.
The tender offer is scheduled to expire on February 21, 1997.
Barefoot is the nation's second large lawn care service company. ServiceMaster provides services to residential, healthcare, educational and commercial customers.
